Recap: Nate privately discusses with Deanna that he decked Matthew and injured him and that could be the cause of Matthew's head trauma. Dani enters and they are hesitant to reveal to her what they are talking about knowing that she has been with Destiny and Matthew's parents who reveal that Matthew might not recover.

Cutter is confident that things will go his way after he got Clint to give him Asa's house if he (Cutter) agrees to get Tess put in St. Anne's. He wants to get back with Aubrey and have her dump Joey now that they no longer need her to be married to him in order to achieve their "goal". But she is done with Cutter and wants to make it up to Joey and declare that she loves him.

Rex confronts Clint not knowing that he is dying. While Shane and Gigi are at Buenos Dias, Robert Ford talks to Shane about how his life was not much different when he was Shane's age and how he made things better with working out and getting older. Yet he may still have Tess on the brain and she-him. Viki goes to see Tess at St. Anne's telling her she has to let Jessica out but Tess is not going to budge regardless of anything Viki tells her.
Transcript: Nora: Is Matthew out of surgery?
Nurse: Yes, he is.
Bo: And?
Nurse: You'll have to talk to the doctor.
Bo: All right.
Nora: Where is she?
Dr. Pryor: Mr. and Mrs. Buchanan.
Bo: Dr. Pryor, what's going on?
Nora: How's Matthew?
Dr. Pryor: The surgery didn't go as well as we had hoped.
Destiny: I have to call you back. Matthew's doctor is here.
Dani: What? Oh, my God. Ok, call me when you know something.
[SCENE_BREAK]
Nate: I can't believe this. What happened to Matthew is my fault.
Deanna: You just punched him, right?
Nate: And he fell, and he hit his head, and now he's having brain surgery.
Deanna: I'm sure it is just a coincidence.
Dani: What's a coincidence? Did you see everyone's favorite patriarch on TV?
[SCENE_BREAK]
Gigi: It's all everyone's talking about.
Rex: This lackey TV producer asks me about Clint still not acknowledging that I'm his son, since he confessed every other horrible thing that's happened in this town.
Gigi: What I don't get is, why did Clint confess at all? What suddenly made him bare his soul?
[SCENE_BREAK]
Clint: What's happening now?
Viki: I just got here, Clint. They're bringing Tess in now. I know we have a long road ahead of us, but I am so relieved that we'll finally get our daughter back.
Clint: I just hope that Jessica gets back here before my heart gives out.
Tess: Let go of me! Let me go!
Clint: I'm sorry I can't do more.
Viki: No, listen, she's getting the help that she needs because of you. You made this happen. Thank you.
Clint: It was the least that I could do. Listen, I will check in with you later. Bye. Tess is finally at St. Ann's.
Joey: So you made the deal with Cutter?
Clint: Yeah. He took me for a bundle, but it's done. Now you can tell your good-for-nothing wife to take a hike.
Joey: I already did.
[SCENE_BREAK]
Aubrey: Rama, what's wrong?

Rama: [Sniffles] I'm a coward and a hypocrite. I'm always pushing Vimal--be brave, be strong-- yet I didn't have the guts to tell my husband the truth, that the baby I told him I was carrying never existed.
Aubrey: I found out what happens when you tell the truth. I told Joey everything.
Rama: You confessed? How could you do this to me, Aubrey? Where am I gonna live? At least all the lies I told him didn't prevent me from keeping a roof over my head.
Aubrey: Calm down, ok? I convinced Joey that if he threw me out, Ryder would end up in foster care.
Rama: Oh, my God. Thank Vishnu.
Aubrey: No, it's not a good thing. I hurt Joey. You don't understand. You should've seen his face. It broke his heart when I admitted that Cutter and I have just been conning him this whole time.
Cutter: Did I just hear my name?
Aubrey: How did you get in here?
Cutter: Don't worry about it. I'm gonna turn that frown upside down. I have good news.
[SCENE_BREAK]
Jessica: Let me go! Let me go! Let me go! Let me go! I'm gonna kill you! I'm gonna shoot you! And kill my stupid husband for ratting me out!
Viki: Please be gentle with her.
Orderly: I am sorry, ma'am, but she is a danger to the staff and to herself.
Tess: And to you, too, bitch!
Orderly: Come on. Come on.
Tess: Let me go! No!
[SCENE_BREAK]
Rex: Clint doesn't have a soul to bare. I don't know what inspired dear, old Dad to perform those public mea culpas, but whatever the reason, he did it for himself.
Gigi: You're probably right.
Rex: I just hope that Bo didn't buy into any of Clint's crap.
[SCENE_BREAK]
Bo: What happened during the surgery, Dr. Pryor?
Destiny: How is he? How's Matthew?
Bo: We don't know yet.
Dr. Pryor: I'm sorry, but unless you're a family member, I need to speak to Mr. and Mrs. Buchanan in private.
[SCENE_BREAK]
Tess: Get your hands off me, or I'll rip them off!
Orderly: You ok, ma'am?
Viki: Yes, I'm fine, thank you. Look, my daughter--does she really need a straitjacket and a padded cell?
Orderly: We've been instructed to treat her as extremely violent.
Viki: I would like to go in, please.
Orderly: With all due respect, ma'am, I would advise against that.
Viki: I understand your concern, but that's my child in there, and I need to see her.
Orderly: We'll be right outside.
Second Orderly: Press the red button if you need help.
Viki: Thank you.
Tess: Listen, get me out of this or I promise you will never see Ryder or me again. I'll get you your son back, ok? I'll tell you all about Aubrey. Get your hands off me!
[SCENE_BREAK]
Aubrey: All right. Make it quick.
Cutter: Is this place bugged?
Aubrey: Not that I know of.
Cutter: Good. Then you can stop pretending to care about the kid.
Aubrey: I do care about the kid.
Cutter: We don't need Joey anymore, either, because I just cut a deal with Clint. Got Tess committed.
Aubrey: Really?
Cutter: Still jealous?
Aubrey: Of you and Tess?

Cutter: I only married her so I could succeed where you had failed--namely, in squeezing every dime out of your husband. See? That's my new account balance thanks to a generous transfer from your beloved father-in-law.
Rama: Oh, my God, Aubrey! All 3 of us are set for life!
Cutter: We can be together again. I want you back.
[SCENE_BREAK]

Joey: I didn't take your advice. I know you wanted me to play things close to the vest, but I couldn't pretend that there was nothing wrong between Aubrey and me anymore, not after Kelly almost died. And life is too short to waste another minute with Aubrey.
Clint: What did you tell her?
Joey: That I knew everything. That she and Cutter lied to me about being brother and sister, that they were actually lovers, and that the only reason she married me was for our family's money.
Clint: And what did she say to that?
Joey: She admitted everything.
Clint: Of course, she did.
Joey: She also told me that she loved me.
Clint: Oh...
Joey: That her feelings were real and that she had changed.
Clint: Ha. I hope you threw that little bitch out.
Joey: No. Dad, no, I didn't.
[SCENE_BREAK]
Rex: During Clint's big show, I was with Natalie.
Gigi: How is she doing? Any news about Liam?
Rex: Not yet. She's putting on this brave face, but she's a wreck. That's why I'm here. I was hoping to sneak her in some contraband grub. Not that food's gonna help.
Gigi: Coming right up. Hey, kiddo.
Shane: Hey.
Rex: Hey, there's my handsome boy. How was today's session?
Shane: I really liked Dr. Buhari.
Rex: I know.
Shane: It's crazy what happened to her. I can't believe Dr. Saybrooke killed her and then stole my baby cousin.
Rex: Do you like Dr. Shaffer?
Shane: She's ok. She thinks that I could stop home-schooling in the fall.
Rex: What does that mean?
Shane: She wants me to go back to Llanview High in September.
Rex: Yeah? How do you feel about that?
[SCENE_BREAK]
Nate: Did you talk to Destiny? Is Matthew ok?
Dani: We don't know anything yet. Destiny hung up on me when the doctors came back.
Nate: Did she tell you why Matthew had brain surgery all of a sudden? I mean, what happened? Was he hurt or something?
Dani: I have no idea, Nate. All Destiny told me was that Matthew had a headache.
Nate: A headache? Do they know what caused it?
Dani: What caused it?
Deanna: Was it like a migraine or--
Dani: I don't know. Why?
Nate: I just--I just feel bad for Matthew.
Dani: Nate, since when? What-- you can't stand Matthew. Where is this coming from?
[SCENE_BREAK]
Dr. Pryor: Mr. and Mrs. Buchanan, Matthew survived the surgery, but the bleeding on his brain was worse than we realized going in. It was a very complicated procedure.
Bo: But he's gonna be all right, isn't he?
Dr. Pryor: I'm afraid we don't know.
[SCENE_BREAK]
Shane: September's like a million years away. I'm sure I'll be ok by then.
Gigi: I hope Natalie's hungry. Carlotta went a little overboard.
Shane: Dad, I made a card for Aunt Natalie. Do you think you can bring it to her?
Rex: Yeah. She'll love it. Thanks, dude. See ya later.
Gigi: Oh. Bye.
Rex: See ya.
Gigi: So...did you like your new doctor?
Shane: Whatever.
Gigi: What do you mean?
Shane: What's the difference? You think she's gonna change anything? When September comes around, I'm still gonna be a loser!
[SCENE_BREAK]
Tess: Came in here all by yourself? You're either the bravest or the dumbest person I've ever met.
Viki: Tess, I need you to understand that Clint and I are doing this for your own good.
Tess: I need you to understand that I don't need my arms and my hands to hurt you.
Viki: I'm sure that's true, and even if you do, you are a part of our daughter, and we care about you.
Tess: God, you're boring.
Viki: Tess, you were out of control.
Tess: You haven't seen anything yet.
Viki: You were quite willing to marry a con man who was more than happy to sell you to Clint.
Tess: So how much did I go for?

Viki: You know, from the minute you entered Cutter's life, he was plotting against you. And you never saw it coming. Since you came back, you've managed to stay a step ahead of Brody and me, but not anymore. You finally made a big mistake and so it's over now, ok? You lost. It is time for Jessica to come back and be a mother to her two children.
[SCENE_BREAK]
Aubrey: You want to be with me? I told you already, Cutter, I love Joey.
Cutter: No. You don't. You don't. Those feelings aren't real, Aubrey. What we have-- that's real.
Aubrey: With you married to someone else?
Cutter: Things between Tess and I are done. What we have is really good. We just got derailed. It's ok, though. I fixed everything.
Aubrey: You did?

Cutter: Yeah. You don't need to play house anymore. All right? I mean, snagging the kid, that was--that was a good move. But now that Tess is in St. Ann's, Jessica's gonna come back. Ryder's gonna go back to his mommy. So you don't need to play Mrs. Cleaver anymore. You can dump Joey. Come on. I can give you everything you want.
Rama: Take the deal, Aubrey. What else do you have now that Joey knows everything?
Cutter: Wait, Joey what?
Rama: She admitted everything to Joey, and now he hates her guts. You're all Aubrey has left.
[SCENE_BREAK]
Clint: Joey, I hope you didn't buy that load of crap that Aubrey was trying to sell you. You don't honestly think she has feelings for you, do you?
Joey: Hell no! Absolutely not. It's just that she pointed out the fact that if we split up, we'd lose custody of Ryder. And I can't let some strangers take care of my sister's child.

Clint: I know. I don't want my grandson in foster care, but Tess is now at St. Ann's, and soon Jessie will be able to be a mom again to Ryder and Bree, and then you can kick that Aubrey to the curb. I just want you to watch your back. Make damn sure that you're free of that woman.
Joey: Look at me, Dad. There's nothing more that I want than to be free of her, too. Then maybe I can have a chance to go ahead and get Kelly back. But anyway, what about you?
Clint: What about me?
Joey: Dad, you just confessed to everything...on TV. What is gonna happen to you when you get out of here?
Clint: You let me worry about my confession.
Joey: Why did you do it? You've been dodging these charges for months. What made you come clean now?
[SCENE_BREAK]
Nate: I know I'm not Matthew's biggest fan, but I wouldn't wish brain surgery on my worst enemy.
Deanna: I'm sure Destiny will call as soon as she hears something.
Dani: I don't know that, either. She might not be able to. Destiny said the cell phone reception there really sucks.
Nate: Maybe you should go be with her.
Dani: You think I should?
Nate: Yeah. She's probably all by herself.
Dani: You're absolutely right. She sounded like she was starting to freak out.
Nate: So go. But keep me posted, ok? Even if we're not friends, I'm still pulling for Matthew.
Dani: Thank you. I really appreciate that.
Nate: Oh, my God, Deanna. I did this. I did this to Matthew.
[SCENE_BREAK]
Dr. Pryor: We were able to clear up the bleeding in Matthew's brain, but the trauma from the surgery could still cause his brain to swell.
Bo: Can't you do something to prevent that?
Dr. Pryor: Yes. I've already put Matthew on steroids and anticonvulsives. We're monitoring his intracranial pressure.
Bo: But what are the odds that this is gonna happen?
Dr. Pryor: We need to keep a close eye on him.
Nora: Ok, say it does happen. What is the treatment? There--is there a treatment?
Dr. Pryor: I'm afraid not.
Bo: Can we see him?
Dr. Pryor: Of course. He should be back any minute.
Destiny: Wait, wait, wait, wait. My God. Oh, my God. Matthew, what did they do to you? What happened? What happened?
[SCENE_BREAK]
Clint: Joey, just don't worry about my confession. It was just--time to settle all my accounts. Now, I just want you to take very good care of my grandson.
Joey: I'm on my way home to do that just now.
Clint: Ok. Um...that could be a problem.
Joey: What do you mean?
Clint: Cutter drove a hard bargain and, well, I had to agree. I only agreed for Jessie's sake.
Joey: Dad, what are you talking about?
Clint: I had to give Cutter Pa's house.
Joey: So in order to get my sister the help that she's needed for months, Cutter blackmailed you into giving him our home?
Clint: Yeah. That about sums it up.
Joey: This is the one time I wish I was just like you. I'd show Cutter the business end of a shotgun.
Clint: Don't, son. Whatever you do, don't you ever be like your old man.
Joey: Dad, are you sure you're ok?
Clint: Go get that baby of yours, and you go find him a new home.
Joey: I will. Look, I hope you can stay out of jail, Dad, because Ryder's gonna need his grandpa.
Clint: Yeah.
Joey: Bye. Love you.
[SCENE_BREAK]
Tess: I lost? Look around, Viki. I'm still here. And where, oh where, is little Jessica? Oh, wait. She's nowhere. You're never gonna see her again, so I won.
Viki: What exactly is it that you've won?
Tess: My life!
Viki: You call this a life?
Tess: I'll get out of here.

Viki: Why would you want to? You have nothing. Nobody cares about you, except the people that you despise. You have no money. You have nowhere to go. You will simply fall into the hands of more men who just want to use you, like Cutter and Ford.
Tess: Ford never used me. Brody and Clint wouldn't let him see his own damn kid. All he wanted to do was to be with Ryder.
Viki: Do I detect actual feelings there?
[SCENE_BREAK]

Shane: Just because you and Dad took me off MyFace doesn't mean that they stopped writing about me. Just because I'm not in school doesn't mean that they're not talking about me, making cracks about how Wheezy tried to kill himself and couldn't even do that right. I'm sure they can't wait for me to go back.
Gigi: Then you won't go back. Not until you're ready. I promise. The principal and the teachers know what's going on. It's gonna get better.
[Crash]
Shane: You better go take care of that. It's ok, Mom. Dr. Buhari said to say what's on my mind and not hold back. That's all I'm doing.
Gigi: Ok. Cool. Keep doing that.
Ford: Hey. I heard what you said, about those guys at school.
Shane: So?
Ford: So I've been there.
[SCENE_BREAK]
Clint: What are you doing here?
Rex: I came to see Natalie. My sister. Too bad. I was hoping to see you handcuffed to your bed, but I guess Bo brought your prime-time pity party.
Clint: How's Shane?
Rex: Like you care.
Clint: He's my grandson.
Rex: You do not get to call him that.
Clint: Well, it's the truth.
Rex: Why can't you say it on TV?
Clint: What are you talking about?
Rex: You confessed to everything else. You'd rather be a DNA tamperer, a murderer, but you can't admit that I'm your son.
Clint: That wasn't the point.
Rex: So why bother, right? You must really hate me. Tell me--what exactly is it about me that you can't stand?
[SCENE_BREAK]
Orderly: Excuse me, Miss. We need to take him to his room.
Destiny: Matthew, Matthew, please, Matthew. Please, Matthew.
Nora: Oh, my God.
Bo: I got you, honey. Dr. Pryor: He's stable. Vital signs are steady.
Nora: Is he in pain?
Dr. Pryor: No, not at all. I'll give you some time with your son.
Nora: Thank you. Hello, my beautiful, brave son. You gotta do this, ok? You gotta... you gotta come through this for us, ok?
Bo: Proud of you, son. I wish I could trade places with you. I'd give anything if I could.
[SCENE_BREAK]
Dani: Des? Hey. Hey, come here. Come here. Hey. What happened with Matthew? What happened?
Destiny: Dani, he's in the ICU. He looks awful.
Dani: What did the doctor say?
Destiny: I don't know. I couldn't hear. She wouldn't say anything to Mr. and Mrs. B in front of me. That can't be good.
Dani: He was fine. How did this even happen?
Destiny: His parents asked me the same thing. All I know is he had a headache. Just a stupid headache.
[SCENE_BREAK]
Nate: He got that headache after I hit him.
Deanna: Ok, ok, all right, Nate, just stop for a second. Take a breath and tell me exactly what happened.
Nate: I told you--after I found out that Matthew let me and my mom take the rap for killing my father, I went to his house, and I punched him.
Deanna: And it was just once?
Nate: Yeah, but after I hit him, he fell, and he hit his head really hard.
Deanna: Was he bleeding? Did he pass out?
Nate: No. Two seconds later, he was looking me in the eye, making excuses for himself. He was ok.
Deanna: Then no way is this on you.
Nate: Maybe, but... Natasha Richardson was ok, too.
Deanna: Who?
Nate: She's an actress. She was Liam Neeson's wife? She hit her head in a skiing accident. She thought she was fine, too, but a couple hours later--
Deanna: She was skiing, Nate. Those people go, like, 40 miles an hour. This is not the same.
[SCENE_BREAK]
Nora: We love you, sweetheart.
Bo: We hope that helps. It's all we've got right now. We love you, son. We love you so much.
[Nora sniffles]
[Machine beeping steadily]
Nora: What's going on?
[SCENE_BREAK]
Cutter: So you told Joey about us and the scam? All of it?
Aubrey: Clint is the one who spilled everything. All I did was confirm it.
Rama: And if not for Ryder, we'd all have been homeless. But you know what? Now you've solved all our problems. And I'd very much like my wedge of the pie as soon as humanly possible, please.
Cutter: Rama, can I talk to Aubrey alone for a minute?
Rama: No, and leave you two to abscond with the jackpot? I think not.
Cutter: Ok. It doesn't matter that Joey knows now. Because we're all good. We're good to go. I love you.
Aubrey: But I don't love you anymore, Cutter. I love my husband. And I'm gonna spend the rest of my life trying to make up for what I did to him. I'm gonna find a way to make you love me again.
[SCENE_BREAK]

Rex: You know what? Forget it. I don't even care why you didn't tell everyone that I'm your son. I don't even know why I'm getting mad. You're not worth it. The last time I saw you, you had the stones to come into my house right after my son tried to commit suicide.
Clint: I was concerned for Shane.
Rex: Do you remember what you said to me? You said that it was my fault Shane had been bullied. You said that I was a bad father. Well, if I am, it's because of you.
[SCENE_BREAK]
Ford: There. That's me when I was a freshman.
Shane: No way!
Ford: I keep it in my wallet. It's a good motivator for when I don't want to go to the gym.
Shane: That's really you?
Ford: My dad didn't like spending money on me and my brother, so most of our clothes were from thrift shops.
Shane: You were so skinny, too.
Ford: Well, he didn't like spending money on food, either, so we were runts.
Shane: Where was your mom?
Ford: She took off when I was little.
Shane: That sucks.

Ford: Yeah, it did. I mean, we're ok now, but back when I was a kid, it just gave the other kids something to give us a hard time about. They would draw pictures of me on the bathroom wall. They'd put all this kind of disgusting stuff in my backpack. They even held me down and made me eat dirt or garbage or whatever.
Shane: That's gross.
Ford: Like you said, it sucked. And I thought things weren't gonna change. But they did.
Shane: How? What happened?
[SCENE_BREAK]
Tess: Yeah, you do detect feelings. It's hate. I hate Ford.
Viki: Clearly.
Tess: And you should hate Ford, too. When Jessica thought she was a virgin, he used her as a blow-up doll.
Viki: And he used you as an ATM.
Tess: So what? So what if he did get some? He didn't get very much. He got diapers and formula. All he ever wanted was to be with that kid.
Viki: And you didn't have a problem with that?

Tess: I was having fun! And you want to know what was most fun? Sending you that picture of Charlie playing tonsil hockey with Echo-Echo- Echo. How did it feel, huh? Watching your husband slobber all over the same woman who was with Clint all those years ago? Oh, right, yeah, you flipped out.
Viki: That's not going to work, Tess.
Tess: Niki Smith came out, and you lost custody of Jessica's kid, so I'm not the only screw-up now, am I?
Viki: But I got help for it.

Tess: But your husband didn't put you in here, did he? Why is that? Oh, wait, because you don't have a husband. Viki, you should be thanking me, because if you had somebody that cared about you as much as you say you care about me, we'd be roomies. But no one cares about you, either.
[SCENE_BREAK]
Deanna: Nate, it was one punch. One. Anything could've caused this. I bet your girlfriend's gonna call any minute and tell you Matthew's fine.
Nate: You think?
Deanna: Yeah, I do.
Nate: Ok. Yeah. Fine. Thanks. I really needed a voice of reason.
Deanna: That's me, all right. The voice of reason.
[SCENE_BREAK]
Nora: Help, somebody! Help, please!
Dr. Pryor: His heart rate's dropped.
Nora: What does that mean?
Dr. Pryor: I need you both to leave. Now.
Nurse: If you could just wait outside.
[SCENE_BREAK]
Viki: You always lash out at me the most when you're afraid that Jessie is coming back.
Tess: Please. I'm never letting Jessica out again. This time I get my life. I've paid my dues.
Viki: By hurting the people that Jessie loves.

Tess: Really? I've taken one for the team for way too long. I have let way too many greasy pigs snort and grunt all over me. Like Norman Leeds. He made Jessica his little movie star, but when the camera was rolling, the stand-in Tess came in, so any sex offender could just put his hands all over her.
Viki: I am so sorry that that happened to you, but it was Niki Smith.
Tess: Niki Smith's a part of you, isn't she?
Viki: Yes. Yes, she is, just as you are a part of Jessica, and I love Jessica, no matter what she says or does. So I love you, too. I love you, Tess.
[SCENE_BREAK]

Ford: My dad got me a job at construction. It's probably the one good thing he ever did for me. The work was really hard, but I got shredded. And I think the guys on the crew felt bad for me, because they kept buying me lunch. And by September of that year, I'd grown about a foot.
Shane: What happened when you went back to school?
Ford: The guys that used to pick on me were scared of me now. I started working out at the school gym. Nobody messed with me, unless, of course, I deserved it, which sometimes I did.
Shane: Why? What'd you do?
Ford: Well, the guys didn't like me because the girls did.
Shane: Seriously?
Ford: Yeah, dude. So if you ever want any workout tips, I'm your man.
Shane: Thanks.
Ford: No problem.
Gigi: Dinner's waiting for you in the back.
Shane: Thanks, Mom. I'll see you around.
Ford: Ok.
Gigi: That was a very nice thing you just did.
Ford: I left out the part about suiting up in a hot dog costume to make money and losing my kid in a custody fight.
Gigi: I still think what you did to Jessica last year was wrong, but...I think Ryder's pretty lucky to have you as a dad, and I hope you get him back.
Ford: Thank you. But hoping isn't enough.
[SCENE_BREAK]
Aubrey: Joey, I know you don't believe me, but I am not staying with you just for Ryder. I'm staying because I love you.
Rama: I've known my friend a long time and I've never seen her like this. I think she means it.

Cutter: So she loves you, huh, Joe-Joe? I heard that one, too. So you really had no idea that Aubrey and I weren't related until your daddy told you? That is hilarious. Aubrey and I, we had so many laughs about all of that.
Aubrey: Cutter, stop it!
Cutter: Then I'd carry her off into bed. If I had a dime every time that I nailed your wife behind your back, I'd be richer than all you Buchanans.
Aubrey: Oh, my God! Joey, stop! Joey!
[SCENE_BREAK]
Clint: I was concerned about my grandson, that's all.
Rex: Stop calling Shane your grandson, ok? He doesn't have a grandfather. He has a father-- me. I'll take care of him.
Clint: Yes. You are doing a very good job.

Rex: No. No, I'm no better than you are. You know what I did? To protect my son, I hired a bunch of goons to rough up Jack Manning. That's your M.O., right? Every lie you break, every lie you tell, every life you ruin, it's all to protect the family. I sank straight to your level. But the last thing I want to be is a father like you.
[SCENE_BREAK]
Tess: You love me?
Viki: Yes, I do. Tess?
Tess: Mom? Mom, where am I? I have to get home to Bree and Ryder. Please, Mom, you have to get me out of here.
Viki: Nice try.
Tess: Go to hell! Better yet, go home and plan Jessica's funeral, because I would rather die than let her out again.
Viki: No. My daughter Jessica will never let that happen.
[Door beeps]
[SCENE_BREAK]
Nate: Why hasn't she called yet?
Deanna: Hey, we can't just sit around waiting. Nate, you want to watch a movie or something?
Nate: I'm calling her.
[SCENE_BREAK]
Nora: What's taking them so long?
